Articles.Content: I've recently updated to Beta 0.90, but once I did all old parts (ones that weren't added in the latest update) appear twice in the ship building menus. It's not a massive problem but if someone knows how to fix it I would like to know. I have 64-bit Windows if that helps.

If you patched or installed over the last version, it is possible you can get duplicate parts like that.

The simplest way to fix would be to delete the entire KSP folder and re-install, make sure to back up any saves or ships you want to keep first.
